      • Upgrading to a Paid Plan
      • Terraform Provider for Squadcast

    Upgrading to a Paid Plan

    If you love the platform and want to bring in more of your team to make use of all the features, this document will help you do just that

    If you’re here today, thank you! This is a great validation for our existence as a company. :)

    All you’ll have to do now is move to Billing from the panel on the left and activate a plan of your choice by adding your card details.

    Note:

    Only the Account Owner will be able to view the Billing section on the left navigation panel as the the billing privileges are exclusive to the Account Owner.

    If you have additional questions about our plans and features, feel free to reach out to sales@squadcast.com with your questions and we’ll be happy to help you pick a plan!
